verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: that Canadians were smuggling shoes across the border “ because the tariffs are so massive . ” But under Nafta , Canada does not charge a tariff on American shoe imports] .

President Trump said on Tuesday that Canadians [V: were] smuggling shoes across the border “ because the tariffs are so massive . ” But under Nafta , Canada does not charge a tariff on American shoe imports .
